{Housing
Two{schools}in these villages, and an old Chapel have been converted into houses.The{oldest}house in the area is {Hankerton Manor Farm}which is in the original Domesday Book.Like the Church and the old vicarage ,it is said to be haunted. In Hankerton there is an estate of 36 modern houses. Three years ago money was raised to build the{new village hall in Charlton. It was built on the site leased by Lord Suffolk in return for a{peppercorn rent of Â£1 p.a.. The site includes a large recreational area which is used by cricket,football and rugger teams and also provides a play area for younger children.
